key_risks: Environmental and safety concerns, including toxic emissions and challenges in meeting sustainability targets
Financial and legal risks, such as labor disputes, pay discrimination claims, and stock volatility
Ethical and social issues, including supply chain ethics and community impact concerns
controversies: Toxic chemical emissions from the Niagara Falls plant
Labor-related lawsuits, including unpaid wages and benefits in Malaysia and a retaliatory discharge claim in Kansas
Supreme Court case *Ledbetter v. Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co.* regarding pay discrimination
environmental_issues: Challenges in achieving 100% sustainable materials by 2030 and replacing petroleum-derived oils by 2040
social_issues: Allegations of labor abuses in the supply chain, particularly in Malaysia
Community criticism of environmental practices in areas like Niagara Falls
governance_issues: Handling of pay discrimination claims and labor disputes
Integration risks and financial pressures following the acquisition of Cooper Tire

sources.title: Ledbetter v. Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co. - Wikipedia
sources.snippet: Ledbetter v. Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co., 550 U.S. 618 (2007), is an employment discrimination decision of the Supreme Court of the United States.
